descriptors.label: Platform_STK3600_blink_SQA
descriptors.description:
SQA Blink example. Template for new projects.

GITHUB SQA This example project uses EFM32 CMSIS and the EMLIB peripheral library to
demonstrate the use of the LED's on the starter kit. This example is intended as
a skeleton for new projects.

Board:  Silicon Labs EFM32LG_STK3600 Starter Kit
Device: EFM32LG990F256

descriptors.label: Platform_STK3600_cslib_SQA
descriptors.description:
SQA CSLIB example. Template for new projects.

GITHUB SQA This example project uses the capacitive sensing firmware library to sample
capacitive sensing buttons on the STK.  Real-time sample information, touch
qualification status, and other state variables can be displayed and examined
in the Capacitive Sensing Profiler tool.

Board:  Silicon Labs EFM32LG_STK3600 Starter Kit
Device: EFM32LG990F256
